title: 16-year-old boy shot in Chatham
text:
A 16-year-old boy was shot in the leg Sunday evening in the Chatham neighborhood on the South Side.
About 7:20 p.m., he was walking in the 800 block of East 82nd Street when someone fired shots from a vehicle, according to Chicago Police.
The boy was taken to Comer Childrenâ€™s Hospital where his condition was stabilized, police said.
Investigators think the attack was gang-related.
